data.trans_hint: Anh khăng khăng đòi thức khuya.
data.en_hint: He insisted on staying up late at night.

data.answer_en_hint: He insisted on staying up late at night.

data.trans_hint: Các vấn đề của anh ấy bắt nguồn từ tuổi thơ khó khăn của anh ấy.
data.en_hint: His problems stem from his difficult childhood.
data.content_game_1: His problems stem from his difficult childhood.
data.answer_en_hint: His problems stem from his difficult childhood.

data.trans_hint: Vấn đề đáng bàn bây giờ là làm cách nào để nói với mẹ cậu về việc chia tay bạn trai mà không làm bà sốc.
data.en_hint: What's at issue now is how you tell your mom about your breakup with your boyfriend without shaking her up.
data.content_game_1: What's at issue now is how you tell your mom about your breakup with your boyfriend without shaking her up.
data.answer_en_hint: What's at issue now is how you tell your mom about your breakup with your boyfriend without shaking her up.

data.trans_hint: Lẽ ra cô ấy nên nói cho mẹ mình biết vấn đề với điểm số hiện tại ở trường.
data.en_hint: She was supposed to tell her mom about her problem with her grades at school.
data.content_game_1: She was supposed to tell her mom about her problem with her grades at school.
data.answer_en_hint: She was supposed to tell her mom about her problem with her grades at school.

data.trans_hint: Jade thực sự khiến mẹ cô ấy nổi điên khi nghỉ lớp học thêm mà không thèm nói với giáo viên một tiếng.
data.en_hint: Jade really drove her mom round the bend when she quit her extra class without a word to her teacher.
data.content_game_1: Jade really drove her mom round the bend when she quit her extra class without a word to her teacher.
data.answer_en_hint: Jade really drove her mom round the bend when she quit her extra class without a word to her teacher.

data.trans: Đối diện với điều gì (sự thật đau lòng, điều khó chấp nhận)
data.trans_hint: Đã đến lúc bạn cần phải đối diện với lỗi lầm của mình và nói lời xin lỗi với mẹ rồi Miley à.
data.en_hint: It's time you faced up to your mistake and said sorry to your mom, Miley.
data.content_game_1: It's time you faced up to your mistake and said sorry to your mom, Miley.
data.answer_en_hint: It's time you faced up to your mistake and said sorry to your mom, Miley.

data.trans: Làm cái gì đó thêm gắn kết
data.trans_hint: Những cuộc trò chuyện mỗi ngày chắc chắn sẽ giúp mối quan hệ giữa mẹ và con gái thêm gắn kết.
data.en_hint: Daily conversations between a mom and a daughter are a good way to hold their relationship together.
data.content_game_1: Daily conversations between a mom and a daughter are a good way to hold their relationship together.
data.answer_en_hint: Daily conversations between a mom and a daughter are a good way to hold their relationship together.

data.trans: Cái mà những người khác thấy khó chịu
data.trans_hint: Tôi thấy việc cãi vã giữa mẹ và con gái thứ khiến những người khác thấy khó chịu là chuyện hoàn toàn bình thường vì tôi nghĩ đó chính là lúc giúp họ hiểu nhau hơn.
data.en_hint: I'm alright with arguments between a mom and a daughter that others find annoying as I think those help two of them understand each other more.
data.content_game_1: I'm alright with arguments between a mom and a daughter that others find annoying as I think those help two of them understand each other more.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm alright with arguments between a mom and a daughter that others find annoying as I think those help two of them understand each other more.

data.trans_hint: Bà Lee biết rõ con gái mình tường tận vì bà luôn quan tâm đến những sự thay đổi của con gái.
data.en_hint: Ms Lee knows her daughter inside out as she always cares for her daughter's changes.
data.content_game_1: Ms Lee knows her daughter inside out as she always cares for her daughter's changes.
data.answer_en_hint: Ms Lee knows her daughter inside out as she always cares for her daughter's changes.

data.content: know something like the back of your hand
data.trans: Nắm rõ cái gì như lòng bàn tay
data.trans_hint: Một bà mẹ thông thái luôn hiểu rõ tâm tư tình cảm của con gái mình như lòng bàn tay nhờ vào bản năng làm mẹ.
data.en_hint: A wise mom always knows her daughter's feelings like the back of her hand by dint of her maternal instinct.
data.content_game_1: A wise mom always knows her daughter's feelings like the back of her hand by dint of her maternal instinct.
data.answer_en_hint: A wise mom always knows her daughter's feelings like the back of her hand by dint of her maternal instinct.

data.trans_hint: Những cái tôi quá lớn có thể hủy hoại mối quan hệ tốt đẹp giữa mẹ và con gái.
data.en_hint: Big egos could tear a good relationship between a mom and a daughter apart.
data.content_game_1: Big egos could tear a good relationship between a mom and a daughter apart.
data.answer_en_hint: Big egos could tear a good relationship between a mom and a daughter apart.

data.trans: Phá hỏng hoàn toàn (một mối quan hệ)
data.trans_hint: Celie không bao giờ dám chống đối lại mẹ vì cô ấy không muốn phá hỏng hoàn toàn mối quan hệ vốn không mấy tốt đẹp với mẹ mình.
data.en_hint: Celie never dares to go against her mom as she doesn't want to tear her poor relationship with her mom into pieces.
data.content_game_1: Celie never dares to go against her mom as she doesn't want to tear her poor relationship with her mom into pieces.
